thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 29 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Qatar's Commercial Bank FY Profit Rises

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Qatar's Commercial Bank FY Profit Rises
text:
Jan 29 (Reuters) - COMMERCIAL BANK:
* FY NET PROFIT 604 MILLION RIYALS VERSUS 501 MILLION RIYALS YEAR AGO
* FY NET INTEREST INCOME 2.52 BILLION RIYALS VERSUS 2.34 BILLION RIYALS YEAR AGO
* BOARD RECOMMENDS CASH DIVIDEND 1 RIYAL PER SHARE FOR YEAR 2017
* AS AT END-DEC, 2017, CUSTOMER LOANS AND ADVANCES STAND AT 89.1 BILLION RIYALS, UP BY 14.6 PERCENT YEAR-ON-YEAR
* AS AT END-DEC, 2017, CUSTOMER DEPOSITS STAND AT 77.6 BILLION RIYALS, UP BY 9.5 PERCENT YEAR-ON-YEAR Further company coverage: )
